text: Bride Flight is a 2008 Dutch Luxembourgian New Zealand romantic drama movie directed by Ben Sombogaart and starring Waldemar Torenstra, Anna Drijver, Karina Smulders, Elise Schaap, Micha Hulshof, Rutger Hauer. == Other websites == * Category:2008 romantic drama movies Category:Dutch romance movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Luxembourgian romance movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:New Zealand romance movies Category:New Zealand drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ben Sombogaart
title: Bride Flight
